Articles.Content:
I have been playing ksp on my ps4. As I have started to build bigger shuttles and bases I start to notice the game stutters badly all the time and my bases and stations just randomly starts shaking and breaks apart and sometimes they just randomly explode after a while and sometimes right after I dock a section . The stuttering at some points gets so bad that every thing is basically uncontrollable. I dont know what the problem can be as it seems to work reasonably fine with the smaller builds. All my software on my console is up to date and ksp is the only game installed on the console and i dont own a ps4 pro so my standard ps4 doesnt have a boost mode. 

Edited April 3, 2020 by RuaanM

100 parts tends to be a limit for ps4 part counts... beyond that, I get tremendous stuttering. This is why autostrutting can be useful, since it allows for zero part-count reinforcement.

With respect to the random exploding... I see you’ve met the kraken
